text: wdrb allah mathalana lhal almwmnyn- aladhin sddaqu allh, webdwh whdh, waeamiluu bshreh, wa'anahum la tdrhm mkhaltt alkafirin fi meamlthm- bihal zawjat fireawn alty kanat fi esmt 'ashadu alkafirin ballh, wahi muwminat ballh, hin qalt: rabi abn li darana eindak fi aljnt, wanqdhny min sultan fireawn wftnth, wamimaa yasdur eanh min 'aemal alshr, wanqdhny min alqawm altaabiein lah fi alzulm waldlal, wamin edhabhm
